FAQ & Compliance

Is the moss hypoallergenic?

No. And it judges you. Our Bio-Sentient Flora Agglomerate (BSFA) is an active participant in your journey.

Do the ghosts offer good customer service?

Their response times vary by ectoplasmic density and unresolved mortal tethers. Please be patient. Queries submitted via ouija board receive priority routing.

What is the ROI on emotional amortization?

The return is non-financial and manifests as a gradual hollowing of intense feeling, replaced by a cool, damp serenity. We project a 78% reduction in "spontaneous crying incidents" after 6 months.

Is this compliant with temporal and dimensional regulations?

SovMoss is fully compliant with Directive 7-Gamma of the Inter-Planar Amusement Accords. All paradoxes are logged and stored off-site.
